Merge checklist
---------------

Maintainer, please confirm the following before merging:

- [ ] All comments resolved
- [ ] This is not your own PR
- [ ] All CIs are happy
- [ ] PR title starts with [MRG]
- [ ] PR description includes phrase "closes <#issue-number>"
